title: Story of a Girl
description: Mai Minomoto knows that it isn't easy to start over again especially for someone like her. From a family who has never been there for her and friends that she has never had, Mai has no hopes for her life. Now she's in a new country and basically starting over again. Her family members are slowly changing and she's meeting new people. She's living her dream but all good dreams come to an end. The demons of her past are not gone and they are definitely not ready to let her go. So how can she possibly be happy when she doesn't know who to trust?
author: Aparajita Yadav
